plot outline: "Kalla Kulla" is a 1975 Indian Kannada film, directed by "K S R Dass" and Produced by "CVL Shastry, DTS Rao, D S Narasinga Rao, Y R Ashwath Narayan".The film Stars "Vishnuvardhan, Dwarakish, Vajramuni, Thoogudeepa Srinivas, Prabhakar, RajanandKunigal Ramanath", in lead roles. The film had musical score by " Rajan-Nagendra". Watch the full Movie, Kalla Kulla, online, only On Eros Now.
